nodes.text: Calgon was a planet located in the Meridian sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Calgon was a planet, located with the Meridian sector's Calgon system in the Outer Rim Territories.
Calgon was the site of a Rebel Alliance operation. Initially, the Rebels intended to achieve their objectives through the use of stealth, but things didn't turn out the way they had planned.
